activateTabWithKeyboard.description: Determines whether tab should be activated with arrow key press, true by default
activateTabWithKeyboard.description_zh: 确定是否应通过按箭头键激活 Tab 键，默认情况下为 true

allowTabDeactivation.description: Determines whether tab can be deactivated, false by default
allowTabDeactivation.description_zh: 确定是否可以停用 tab，默认为 false

autoContrast.description: Determines whether active item text color should depend on background-color of the indicator. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast. Only applicable when variant="pills"
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定活动项文本颜色是否应取决于指示器的 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。仅在 variant=“pills” 时适用

color.description: Changes colors of Tabs.Tab components when variant is pills or default, does nothing for other variants
color.description_zh: 当 variant 为 pills 或 default 时更改 Tabs.Tab 组件的颜色，对其他变体不执行任何操作

defaultValue.description_zh: 非受控零部件的默认值

id.description: Base id, used to generate ids to connect labels with controls, generated randomly by default
id.description_zh: Base id，用于生成 id 以将标签与控件连接起来，默认随机生成

inverted.description: Determines whether tabs should have inverted styles, false by default
inverted.description_zh: 确定制表符是否应具有反转样式，默认情况下为 false

keepMounted.description: If set to false, Tabs.Panel content will be unmounted when the associated tab is not active, true by default
keepMounted.description_zh: 如果设置为 false，则当关联的选项卡未处于活动状态时，将卸载 Tabs.Panel 内容，默认情况下为 true

loop.description: Determines whether arrow key presses should loop though items (first to last and last to first), true by default
loop.description_zh: 确定箭头键按下是否应在项目之间循环（第一个到最后一个和最后一个到第一个），默认情况下为 true

orientation.description_zh: 标签页方向，默认为 '水平'

placement.description: Tabs.List placement relative to Tabs.Panel, applicable only when orientation="vertical", 'left' by default
placement.description_zh: Tabs.List 相对于 Tabs.Panel 的放置，仅在默认为 orientation=“vertical”， 'left' 时适用

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius
